sqlMap.sql: delete from LNSNONSTDPLAN where ACCTNO = :acctno and OPENBRC = :openbrc and REPAYTERM = :repayterm

insert into LNSNONSTDPLAN (ACCTNO, OPENBRC, REPAYTERM, ACCTYPE, CCY, CUSTTYPE, CUSTOMID, NAME, PRDCODE, FLAG1, PRINMINDAYS, INTMINDAYS, ISCALINT, REPAYWAY, LOANTYPE1, LOANSTAT, PROFITBRC, ACCTNO1, FIRSTPRINDATE, FIRSTINTDATE, FIRSTINTFLAG, PRINPERFORMULA, PRINFORMULA, LASTPRINDATE, INTPERFORMULA, INTFORMULA, LASTINTDATE, PRINTERMS, INTTERMS, CURPRINTERM, CURINTTERM, OLDPRINTERM, OLDINTTERM, CONTRACTBAL, OPENDATE, BEGININTDATE, GRACEDAYS, CONTDUEDATE, INTENDDATE, EXTNUMS, INTRATEPLAN, BJTXBL, TXACCTNO, DIACCT, INVESTEE, INVESTMODE, CHANNELTYPE, FUNDCHANNEL, OUTSERIALNO, CONTRASCTNO, CONTRACTAMT, OPENFEE, DEDUCTIONAMT, PROVISIONFLAG, MEMO, NORMALRATE, OVERDUERATE, OVERDUERATE1, MODIFYDATE, MODIFYTIME, TRANDATE, RESERV1, RESERVAMT1, TERMBDATE, TERMEDATE, INTBDATE, INTEDATE, TERMPRIN, TERMINT, BALANCE, DAYS, CALCINTFLAG1, CALCINTFLAG2, RATETYPE, TERMRETDATE, REPAYPRINFLAG, REPAYINTFLAG) values (:acctno, :openbrc, :repayterm, :acctype, :ccy, :custtype, :customid, :name, :prdcode, :flag1, :prinmindays, :intmindays, :iscalint, :repayway, :loantype1, :loanstat, :profitbrc, :acctno1, :firstprindate, :firstintdate, :firstintflag, :prinperformula, :prinformula, :lastprindate, :intperformula, :intformula, :lastintdate, :printerms, :intterms, :curprinterm, :curintterm, :oldprinterm, :oldintterm, :contractbal, :opendate, :beginintdate, :gracedays, :contduedate, :intenddate, :extnums, :intrateplan, :bjtxbl, :txacctno, :diacct, :investee, :investmode, :channeltype, :fundchannel, :outserialno, :contrasctno, :contractamt, :openfee, :deductionamt, :provisionflag, :memo, :normalrate, :overduerate, :overduerate1, :modifydate, current timestamp, :trandate, :reserv1, :reservamt1, :termbdate, :termedate, :intbdate, :intedate, :termprin, :termint, :balance, :days, :calcintflag1, :calcintflag2, :ratetype, :termretdate, :repayprinflag, :repayintflag)

update LNSNONSTDPLAN set ACCTYPE = :acctype, CCY = :ccy, CUSTTYPE = :custtype, CUSTOMID = :customid, NAME = :name, PRDCODE = :prdcode, FLAG1 = :flag1, PRINMINDAYS = :prinmindays, INTMINDAYS = :intmindays, ISCALINT = :iscalint, REPAYWAY = :repayway, LOANTYPE1 = :loantype1, LOANSTAT = :loanstat, PROFITBRC = :profitbrc, ACCTNO1 = :acctno1, FIRSTPRINDATE = :firstprindate, FIRSTINTDATE = :firstintdate, FIRSTINTFLAG = :firstintflag, PRINPERFORMULA = :prinperformula, PRINFORMULA = :prinformula, LASTPRINDATE = :lastprindate, INTPERFORMULA = :intperformula, INTFORMULA = :intformula, LASTINTDATE = :lastintdate, PRINTERMS = :printerms, INTTERMS = :intterms, CURPRINTERM = :curprinterm, CURINTTERM = :curintterm, OLDPRINTERM = :oldprinterm, OLDINTTERM = :oldintterm, CONTRACTBAL = :contractbal, OPENDATE = :opendate, BEGININTDATE = :beginintdate, GRACEDAYS = :gracedays, CONTDUEDATE = :contduedate, INTENDDATE = :intenddate, EXTNUMS = :extnums, INTRATEPLAN = :intrateplan, BJTXBL = :bjtxbl, TXACCTNO = :txacctno, DIACCT = :diacct, INVESTEE = :investee, INVESTMODE = :investmode, CHANNELTYPE = :channeltype, FUNDCHANNEL = :fundchannel, OUTSERIALNO = :outserialno, CONTRASCTNO = :contrasctno, CONTRACTAMT = :contractamt, OPENFEE = :openfee, DEDUCTIONAMT = :deductionamt, PROVISIONFLAG = :provisionflag, MEMO = :memo, NORMALRATE = :normalrate, OVERDUERATE = :overduerate, OVERDUERATE1 = :overduerate1, MODIFYDATE = :modifydate, MODIFYTIME = current timestamp, TRANDATE = :trandate, RESERV1 = :reserv1, RESERVAMT1 = :reservamt1, TERMBDATE = :termbdate, TERMEDATE = :termedate, INTBDATE = :intbdate, INTEDATE = :intedate, TERMPRIN = :termprin, TERMINT = :termint, BALANCE = :balance, DAYS = :days, CALCINTFLAG1 = :calcintflag1, CALCINTFLAG2 = :calcintflag2, RATETYPE = :ratetype, TERMRETDATE = :termretdate, REPAYPRINFLAG = :repayprinflag, REPAYINTFLAG = :repayintflag where ACCTNO = :acctno and OPENBRC = :openbrc and REPAYTERM = :repayterm

select ACCTNO, OPENBRC, REPAYTERM, ACCTYPE, CCY, CUSTTYPE, CUSTOMID, NAME, PRDCODE, FLAG1, PRINMINDAYS, INTMINDAYS, ISCALINT, REPAYWAY, LOANTYPE1, LOANSTAT, PROFITBRC, ACCTNO1, FIRSTPRINDATE, FIRSTINTDATE, FIRSTINTFLAG, PRINPERFORMULA, PRINFORMULA, LASTPRINDATE, INTPERFORMULA, INTFORMULA, LASTINTDATE, PRINTERMS, INTTERMS, CURPRINTERM, CURINTTERM, OLDPRINTERM, OLDINTTERM, CONTRACTBAL, OPENDATE, BEGININTDATE, GRACEDAYS, CONTDUEDATE, INTENDDATE, EXTNUMS, INTRATEPLAN, BJTXBL, TXACCTNO, DIACCT, INVESTEE, INVESTMODE, CHANNELTYPE, FUNDCHANNEL, OUTSERIALNO, CONTRASCTNO, CONTRACTAMT, OPENFEE, DEDUCTIONAMT, PROVISIONFLAG, MEMO, NORMALRATE, OVERDUERATE, OVERDUERATE1, MODIFYDATE, MODIFYTIME, TRANDATE, RESERV1, RESERVAMT1, TERMBDATE, TERMEDATE, INTBDATE, INTEDATE, TERMPRIN, TERMINT, BALANCE, DAYS, CALCINTFLAG1, CALCINTFLAG2, RATETYPE, TERMRETDATE, REPAYPRINFLAG, REPAYINTFLAG from LNSNONSTDPLAN where ACCTNO = :acctno and OPENBRC = :openbrc and REPAYTERM = :repayterm
